description:
Chi-chan the underground dweller has come from beneath the earth to taste the delicious sweets on the surface... but then he got stuck and couldn`t get back home. The one who arrived to help him was Yuka, a middle school girl who seems to frequently encounter people who need help. After being saved by Yuka, Chi-chan makes a decision!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Puripuri! Chii-chan ga Yatte Kita Dechi!
プリプリ! ちぃちゃんがやってきたでち!
